description:
Time-tested stoppers with a transverse taper that allows you to place them securely in bottlenecks, flares, and shallow seams. The tapered shape extends versatility and adds multiple placement options. In addition, the classic shape (convex on one side, concave on the other) allows the unit to cam into position when loaded.

  • Set of 10; sizes 4-13
  • Made of 6061-T6 aluminum with a galvanized steel cable
  • Bright anodized colour coating and laser etched numbering
  • Slightly rounded edges and corners aid removal
name: Black Diamond Stopper Set #4-13
